items.name: The Shadow Mace
notes: In the hands of anyone but Sauron the mace is -30.
The mace becomes instantly invisible whenever the wielder concentrates this desire
items.description: Black ithilnaur mace with glows red when within 300' of an Elf.

items.name: The Black Scale
items.description: Unencumbering black dragonshin and black ithilnaur scale amor. Treat as plate AT20 with a DB of -80

items.name: Fire sword
notes: For every critical hit that the sword does, it will do an additional heat critical hit
Shatters weapons that fail to resist versus a 60th level spell of destruction
Mace of slaying men and elves
Resist versus a 60th level 'slow death' spell
Shatters weapons that fail to resist versus a 60th level spell of destruction
